/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern apartment buildings, their facades made of glass and steel, reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of urban sophistication. The buildings are nestled amidst lush greenery, with trees and shrubs providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape below.
